title: Different sari styles to experiment with this Diwali
text: For some millennials, sari may not be the top thing on their festive wear list, as the idea of draping the six-yards and tripping in it is very real. Here’s the good news, the recent upgrade given to the meticulous silhouette has finally made it functional and gen-next friendly. Props to the modern-day designers for thinking beyond the archetypical version of a sari and serving us with innovative pre-stitched, layered and asymmetrical styles. While Sonam Kapoor Ahuja gave it a yesteryear spin by teaming her sari with an open koti blouse, Shilpa Shetty-Kundra opted for a sari-gown, something you can effortlessly slip into. Here’s our edit of all the unconventional ways in which the leading ladies have worn a sari and so can you.
description: Sonakshi Sinha, Karisma Kapoor and Sonam Kapoor Ahuja showed us how to experiment with different sari styles this Diwali, here’s all you need to know.
